text: 2:15 2 Korin 5:17; Galesia 6:15; Efesus 4:24; Kolosi 1:20-22; 2:14Krais, Moses Osirizir Araziba, ko Akar Gavgaviba, ko bizir a damuasa e mɨkemeziba sara, bar da gɨfa. A ghaze, a kamaghɨn damigh, ikɨzir pumuning damutɨ, aning a ko porogh ikɨva ikɨzir igiar vamɨran otogham. A tuavir kamɨn an e gamizɨ e navir vamɨra iti.
